mapper.insert: INSERT INTO follow_up_record ( id, patient_id, after_surgery_date, follow_up_date, follow_up_status, ultrasound_abnormal, ultrasound_abnormal_detail, need_further_biopsy, biopsy_result, metastasis, metastasis_location, deceased, cause_of_death, arm_edema, arm_edema_treatment, chest_ct_abnormal, head_mr_abnormal, bone_scan_abnormal, scale_rating, is_change_treatment_plan, current_treatment_plan, notes, input_status, created_by, created, modified_by, modified, is_enable, is_del ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{patientId}, #{afterSurgeryDate}, #{followUpDate}, #{followUpStatus}, #{ultrasoundAbnormal}, #{ultrasoundAbnormalDetail}, #{needFurtherBiopsy}, #{biopsyResult}, #{metastasis}, #{metastasisLocation}, #{deceased}, #{causeOfDeath}, #{armEdema}, #{armEdemaTreatment}, #{chestCtAbnormal}, #{headMrAbnormal}, #{boneScanAbnormal}, #{scaleRating}, #{isChangeTreatmentPlan}, #{currentTreatmentPlan}, #{notes}, #{inputStatus}, #{createdBy}, #{created}, #{modifiedBy}, #{modified}, #{isEnable}, #{isDel} )
mapper.select:
SELECT ,
FROM patient_info t1 LEFT JOIN general_info t2 ON t1.id = t2.patient_id WHERE 1 = 1
AND t2.surgical_num LIKE CONCAT('%', #{query.surgicalNum}, '%')
AND t2.case_no LIKE CONCAT('%', #{query.caseNo}, '%')
AND t1.name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{query.name}, '%')
AND (t1.phone LIKE CONCAT('%', #{query.phone}, '%') OR t1.contact_phone LIKE CONCAT('%', #{query.phone}, '%'))
ORDER BY t1.created DESC

SELECT
FROM follow_up_record t WHERE t.patient_id = #{patientId} ORDER BY t.created DESC

SELECT , ,
FROM follow_up_record t LEFT JOIN patient_info t1 ON t.patient_id = t1.id LEFT JOIN general_info t2 ON t1.id = t2.patient_id WHERE t.follow_up_status = '待随访'
AND t1.name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{query.name}, '%')
AND t2.surgical_num LIKE CONCAT('%', #{query.surgicalNum}, '%')
AND t2.case_no LIKE CONCAT('%', #{query.caseNo}, '%')
ORDER BY t.follow_up_date DESC
